chestedcompanions.config.allowChestOnCat: If enabled, chests can be put on cats
chestedcompanions.config.allowChestOnWol: If enabled, chests can be put on wolves
chestedcompanions.config.invertShiftToOp: If enabled, normal click will tell the pet to sit, and shift click will open the chest
chestedcompanions.config.publicChest.des: Everyone will be able to access and equip/remove the pet's chest, not just its owner
chestedcompanions.config.catInventoryCap: Sets the amount of inventory slots for the cat's chest
chestedcompanions.config.wolfInventoryCa: Sets the amount of inventory slots for the wolf's chest
chestedcompanions.config.hideCatChest.de: Hides the chest for cats in case of incompatibilities
chestedcompanions.config.hideWolfChest.d: Hides the chest for wolves in case of incompatibilities
chestedcompanions.config.allowChestOnBab: Chests can be put on baby cats
Chests can be put on baby wolves
chestedcompanions.config.showChestIconOn: Renders a chest icon above the cat, can be used if the chest model can't be displayed
Renders a chest icon above the wolf, can be used if the chest model can't be displayed
